rows.label: qst200217_msg0001
rows.name:
Looks like Harghal was planning to
use Luxuria as a base to smuggle
Pollen Orbs out all around the world.

rows.label: qst200217_msg0003
rows.name:
Luxuria has only recently opened up
to contact with other nations, after all.

rows.label: qst200217_msg0004
rows.name:
Trading procedures are not yet well
established, so suspicious substances
would be difficult to trace.

rows.label: qst200217_msg0005
rows.name:
Trying to conduct shady business
in my homeland, eh? I'll be having
none of that!

rows.label: qst200217_msg0006
rows.name:
This Harghal girl should be showing
up in Genbu Port to collect the goods,
so we'll catch her in the act!

rows.label: qst200217_msg0007
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Haaaahhhhhhh!
I will pass judgment on every last
villain involved in this crooked affair!
